column5: Located right off of I-35 and 5 minutes to Mopac expressway in North Austin, my place is close to Chinatown, Dell, Samsung, and public transport. 10 minutes to The Domain (dining, bars and clubs and shopping), only 15 minutes to midtown and 20 minutes to downtown/convention center area and nightlife. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness, quiet area with easy access to the city, the kitchen, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Cozy apt, queen bed, easy access to I-35 & Domain
